/usr/bin/c++  -g  -pthread -rdynamic CMakeFiles/TestMPI.dir/main.cpp.o  -o TestMPI  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so libapp.a /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so
